languages.text: "Так повелела служительница смерти. Сказала, Первому ткачу греза явилась от Императора, что вас надо омыть в крови бедняги Орто, моего напарника. А я..." {n}Трубовед нервно сглатывает.{/n} "Испугался я, вот и подчинился".

traits.locale_text: "Так повелела служительница смерти. Сказала, Первому ткачу греза явилась от Императора, что вас надо омыть в крови бедняги Орто, моего напарника. А я..." {n}Трубовед нервно сглатывает.{/n} "Испугался я, вот и подчинился".

languages.text: "I did as the servant of death commanded. She said the Emperor gave the First Spinner a sign: that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should be bathed in the blood of poor Orto, my partner. And I, well..." {n}He gulps.{/n} "I was scared. So, I obeyed."
languages.original_text: "Так повелела служительница смерти. Сказала, Первому ткачу греза явилась от Императора, что вас надо омыть в крови бедняги Орто, моего напарника. А я..." {n}Трубовед нервно сглатывает.{/n} "Испугался я, вот и подчинился".

traits.locale_text: "I did as the servant of death commanded. She said the Emperor gave the First Spinner a sign: that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should be bathed in the blood of poor Orto, my partner. And I, well..." {n}He gulps.{/n} "I was scared, so I obeyed."

"I did as the servant of death commanded. She said the Emperor gave the First Spinner a sign: that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should be bathed in the blood of poor Orto, my partner. And I, well..." {n}He gulps.{/n} "I was scared, so I obeyed."

"I did as the servant of death commanded. She said the Emperor gave the First Spinner a sign: that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should be bathed in the blood of poor Orto, my partner. And I, well..." {n}He gulps.{/n} "I was scared. So, I obeyed."

"I did as the servant of death commanded. She said the Emperor gave the First Spinner a sign: that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should be bathed in the blood of poor Orto, my partner. And I, well..." {n}He gulps.{/n} "I was scared. So, I obeyed."

"I did as the servant of death commanded. She said the Emperor gave the First Spinner a sign: that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should be bathed in the blood of poor Orto, my partner. And I, well..." {n}He gulps.{/n} "I was scared. So, I obeyed."

"I did as the bloodspinner commanded. She said the Emperor gave the First Spinner a sign: that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should be bathed in the blood of poor Orto, my partner. And I, well..." {n}He gulps.{/n} "The servants of death are terrifying, so I obeyed."

"I did as the bloodspinner commanded. She said the Emperor gave the First Spinner a sign: that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should be bathed in the blood of poor Orto, my partner. And I, well..." {n}He gulps.{/n} "The servants of death are terrifying, so I obeyed."

"I did as the servant of death commanded. She said the Emperor gave the First Spinner a sign: that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should be bathed in the blood of poor Orto, my partner. And I, well..." {n}He gulps.{/n} "I was scared. So, I obeyed."

languages.text: « Je n'ai fait qu'exécuter les ordres de la servante de la mort. À l'en croire, l'Empereur a adressé un signe au Premier Tisseur : Votre Seigneurie devait baigner dans le sang de ce pauvre Orto, mon partenaire. Et moi... ahem... » {n}Il déglutit péniblement.{/n} « J'étais terrifié, alors j'ai obéi sans broncher. »
languages.original_text: "I did as the servant of death commanded. She said the Emperor gave the First Spinner a sign: that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should be bathed in the blood of poor Orto, my partner. And I, well..." {n}He gulps.{/n} "I was scared. So, I obeyed."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai fait qu'exécuter les ordres de la tisseuse de sang. À l'en croire, l'Empereur a adressé un signe au Premier Tisseur : Votre Seigneurie devait baigner dans le sang de ce pauvre Orto, mon partenaire. Et moi... ahem... » {n}Il déglutit péniblement.{/n} « Les serviteurs de la mort sont si terrifiants que je n'ai pas osé lui désobéir. »

« Je n'ai fait qu'exécuter les ordres de la bonne tisseuse. L'Empereur a adressé un signe au Premier Tisseur : Votre Seigneurie devait baigner dans le sang de ce pauvre Orto, mon partenaire. Je suis un homme pieux, et à mes yeux, la volonté de l'Empereur fait force de loi. »

languages.text: «Hice lo que ordenó la sirvienta de la muerte. Dijo que el Emperador le reveló una señal al Primer Tejedor: que mil{mf|ord|ady} debería bañarse en la sangre del pobre Orto, mi compañero. Y yo, bueno...». {n}Traga saliva.{/n} «Tenía miedo, así que obedecí».
languages.original_text: "I did as the servant of death commanded. She said the Emperor gave the First Spinner a sign: that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should be bathed in the blood of poor Orto, my partner. And I, well..." {n}He gulps.{/n} "I was scared. So, I obeyed."

traits.locale_text: «Hice lo que ordenó la tejedora de sangre. Dijo que el Emperador le reveló una señal al Primer Tejedor: que mil{mf|ord|ady} debería bañarse en la sangre del pobre Orto, mi compañero. Y yo, bueno...». {n}Traga saliva.{/n} «Los sirvientes de la muerte dan mucho miedo, así que obedecí».

«Hice lo que ordenó la tejedora clemente. El Emperador reveló una señal al Primer Tejedor: que mi{mf|lord|lady} debería bañarse en la sangre del pobre Orto, mi compañero. Soy un hombre devoto; cuando el Emperador nos da una señal, debemos seguirla».

languages.text: “是那位死亡的仆从吩咐我去做的。她说，帝皇赐予了首席织网者预兆，说大人您必须沐浴在我工友的鲜血之中，也就是可怜的奥托。而我，呃……”{n}他吞了口唾沫。{/n}“我当时真的吓坏了，于是我就照做了。”
languages.original_text: "I did as the servant of death commanded. She said the Emperor gave the First Spinner a sign: that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should be bathed in the blood of poor Orto, my partner. And I, well..." {n}He gulps.{/n} "I was scared. So, I obeyed."

traits.locale_text: “这是织网者吩咐我去做的。她说，帝皇赐予了首席织网者预兆，说大人您必须沐浴在我工友的鲜血之中，也就是可怜的奥托。而我，呃……”{n}他吞了口唾沫。{/n}“死亡的仆人实在是太可怕了，于是我就照做了。”
“这是仁慈的织网者吩咐我这么做的。帝皇给了初代织网者指示，说您必须沐浴在我的工友的鲜血之中，也就是可怜的奥托。我是个虔诚的人，既然这是帝皇的指示，那我就必须照办。”

languages.text: 「死の使いの命令に従ったんです。彼女は、皇帝が初代の織り手に印をお与えになったと言っていました。陛下は私のパートナーである哀れなオルトの血で洗礼を受けるべきだと。そして私は、その…」{n}彼はゴクリと息を呑んだ。{/n}「死の使いが恐ろしくて、それで言われた通りに従いました」
languages.original_text: "I did as the servant of death commanded. She said the Emperor gave the First Spinner a sign: that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should be bathed in the blood of poor Orto, my partner. And I, well..." {n}He gulps.{/n} "I was scared. So, I obeyed."

traits.locale_text: 「血の織り手の命令に従ったんです。皇帝は初代の織り手に印をお与えになったと言っていました。陛下は私のパートナーである哀れなオルトの血に身を浸すべきだと。そして私は、その…」{n}彼はゴクリと喉を鳴らす。{/n}「死の従者が恐ろしくて、それで従いました」
「優雅な織り手の命令に従ったんです。皇帝は初代の織り手にお告げをお与えになりました。閣下は私のパートナーである哀れなオルトの血を浴びるべきだと。私は敬虔な男だ。皇帝がお示しになれば、それに従わねばならない」

languages.text: "Ich tat, was mir die Dienerin des Todes befohlen hatte. Sie sagte, der Imperator habe dem Ersten Spinner ein Zeichen geschickt, wonach Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} im Blut meines armen Partners Orto baden müsse. Und ich, nun ..." {n}Er schluckt.{/n} "Ich hatte Angst. Also habe ich gehorcht."
languages.original_text: "I did as the servant of death commanded. She said the Emperor gave the First Spinner a sign: that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should be bathed in the blood of poor Orto, my partner. And I, well..." {n}He gulps.{/n} "I was scared. So, I obeyed."

traits.locale_text: "Ich tat, was mir die Blutspinnerin befohlen hatte. Sie sagte, der Imperator habe dem Ersten Spinner ein Zeichen geschickt, wonach Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} im Blut meines armen Partners Oro baden müsse. Und ich, nun ..." {n}Er schluckt.{/n} "Die Diener des Todes sind schrecklich, also habe ich gehorcht."

"Ich habe getan, was die gütige Weberin befohlen hat. Der Imperator hat dem Ersten Weber ein Zeichen gegeben: Dass Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} im Blut des armen Orto gebadet werden soll, meines Partners. Ich bin ein frommer Mann. Wenn der Imperator ein Zeichen gibt, dann muss es befolgt werden."
